overview: Clint Black hosts the upcoming CMT special Christmas in Cowboy Country, which debuts on Dec. 5. Black also performs on the one-hour show, which features dog sledding in Jackson, Wyo.; an Oklahoma City parade led by Texas longhorns; the light show from 37 Street in Austin, Texas; and a dude ranch celebration in Steamboat Springs, Colo.
title: Christmas in Cowboy Country
